title_en: SDG 11.6.2 : Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter (e.g. PM2.5 and PM10) in cities
title_ms: SDG 11.6.2 : Purata tahunan tahap zarah halus (contoh: PM2.5 dan PM10) di bandar-bandar
description_en: The mean annual concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) and 10 microns in diameter (PM10) across urban populations in cities. It serves as a vital resource for monitoring progress towards Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 11.6.2, which aims to reduce the environmental impact of cities, with a particular emphasis on improving air quality.
description_ms: Purata tahunan kepekatan zarah halus yang kurang daripada 2.5 mikron (PM2.5) dan 10 mikron (PM10) dalam populasi bandar di bandar-bandar. Ia berfungsi sebagai sumber penting untuk memantau kemajuan menuju Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 11.6.2, yang bertujuan mengurangkan impak alam sekitar bandar dengan memberi tumpuan khusus kepada peningkatan kualiti udara.

fields.name: matter_type
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Type of particulate matter, either PM2.5 or PM10
fields.description_ms: [Kategoril] Jenis zarah halus, sama ada PM2.5 atau PM10

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: mean
fields.title_en: Mean Concentration of Fine Particulate Matter
fields.description_en: [Float] The mean concentration of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Purata konsentrasi zarah halus di bandar-bandar (mikrogram per kubik meter)

translations_en.mean: Mean Concentration of Fine Particulate Matter
